review: Best dollar for dollar piece of tech I have ever purchased. There is no competition. 3 google chromes I own gathering dust.
author: lit

review: It's great to view original Amazon shows like Bosch ! It's also neat to be able to play your music through the tv screen!
author: Brenda J. Michanczyk

review: I have enjoyed the Fire Stick very much.It is amazing if one has Prime also! Lots of great movies. I am just waiting until local stations begin streaming also!!
author: Michorium

review: They company needs to figure out the sound transfer. You have to turn the tv volume way up when using the stick.Other than that it really is amazing
author: Dkham

review: The product is awesome.  Lots of app choices, the kids love it!!
author: Catherine R.

review: My internet wont stream it cant afford better internet
author: Paul Rheinheimer

review: This is great. I like this better than the Roku I had been using.
author: Hop Maniac

review: I liked what it offered but I felt limited to what I could watch  and at times my remote would stick and flip through the screen uncontrollably. The same movie would be free to watch on Roku but have a fee to watch on Amazon fire stick.
author: DIANA BROWN

review: Love my fire stick!  Super simple to install,  works great..and cheap!
author: April Rainwater
